snippet.title: VR game: Conductor - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Conductor steam page is now LIVE:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/584930

Conductor is a  VR, action-adventure, puzzle game that takes place in a post Industrial apocalypse.

You are on the run from Overcorp and on your way to safety. But to get there you'll have to take control of a locomotive and clear anything that stands in your way, with the help of your gravity cannon.
